00034 /**
00035  * \file
00036  *         Implementation of the raw packet API with broadcast UDP packets
00037  * \author
00038  *         Adam Dunkels <adam@sics.se>
00039  */
00040 
00041 #include "contiki.h"
00042 #include "contiki-net.h"
00043 
00044 #include "net/rawpacket-udp.h"
00045 
00046 #define PORT 8096
00047 
00048 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 void
00050 rawpacket_udp_init(void)
00051 {
00052 
00053 }
00054 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00055 struct rawpacket_conn *
00056 rawpacket_setup(int id)
00057 {
00058   return (struct rawpacket_conn *)udp_broadcast_new(UIP_HTONS(PORT + id), NULL);
00059 }
00060 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00061 void
00062 rawpacket_send(struct rawpacket_conn *c, char *data, int datalen)
00063 {
00064   uip_udp_packet_send((struct uip_udp_conn *)c, data, datalen);
00065 }
00066 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00067 int
00068 rawpacket_received(struct rawpacket_conn *c)
00069 {
00070   return uip_newdata() && (struct uip_udp_conn *)c == uip_udp_conn;
00071 }
00072 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
